gobblin.data.management.trash

Class MockTrash

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.trash.Trash
      • gobblin.data.management.trash.ProxiedTrash
        • gobblin.data.management.trash.MockTrash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GobblinProxiedTrash, GobblinTrash
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestTrash

    public class MockTrash
extends ProxiedTrash
    Mock version of ProxiedTrash for simulating deletions. Can also be used as a mock for Trash.

      • purgeTrashSnapshots

        public void purgeTrashSnapshots()
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from class: Trash
        For each existing trash snapshot, uses a SnapshotCleanupPolicy to determine whether the snapshot should be deleted. If so, delete it permanently.

        Each existing snapshot will be passed to SnapshotCleanupPolicy.shouldDeleteSnapshot(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus, gobblin.data.management.trash.Trash) from oldest to newest, and will be deleted if the method returns true.

        Overrides:
        purgeTrashSnapshots in class Trash
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTrashLocation

        protected Path createTrashLocation(FileSystem fs,
                                   Properties props,
                                   String user)
                            throws IOException
        Description copied from class: Trash
        Create location of Trash directory. Parsed from props at key Trash.TRASH_LOCATION_KEY, defaulting to /home/directory/_GOBBLIN_TRASH.
        Overrides:
        createTrashLocation in class Trash
        Parameters:
        fs - FileSystem where trash should be found.
        props - Properties containing trash configuration.
        user - If the trash location contains the token $USER, the token will be replaced by the value of user.
        Returns:
        Path for trash directory.
        Throws:
        IOException
